This is my first torrent upload so be nice, will you? I started to painstaikingly ripping my old vinyls and this one is rather special. I remember I bought the record becuase I liked the look of the folder... Not all songs stand the test of time, but some are still quite enjoyable. And it is definitive a very rare record, so if you are into vintage synth/electronic/experimental, this is a must have in your collection.

To RIAA, IFPI and friends: this record can&#039;t be found anywhere but second hand so get off my back - I&#039;m doing you a favour by promoting an interest in music history.

To fellow music consumers: please let me know what you think about the quality as I might do some more vinyls in the future and I&#039;m still learning analogue signal processing.

/Lucidor
